# Position 5: Alfredo Reyes

###### **who is councilmember alfredo reyes?**

Councilmember Alfredo Reyes has deep roots, flourishing ties, and relationships with the City Granger. He is a Granger Spartan Alumni and continues to live in the community. His passion for the agriculture industry sparks his motivation to explore the fruits of the labor centrally located within the heart of Granger. While in the process of deep inquiry and focus, Councilmember Reyes learns more about the rich history of the City of Granger and the direct global impact the industry contributes outside of the small region of the City. His expanded knowledge of the industry integrates the importance of advocating for the communities he serves and belongs to particularly, the youth, growers, farmworkers, and students.

###### **experience**

Councilmember Reyes currently serves on a worship team with the Church of the Living God focused on empowering youth and adults with the practice of faith and songs. Furthermore, he coaches the Granger Middle and High School soccer teams. Likewise, Councilmember Reyes is the Director of Coaching and coach of the Washington East SC River Valley Surf soccer club academy.

###### **Term expires**

December 2027

###### **Contact councilmember reyes**

Phone: (509) 854-1725  
Email: [alfredo.reyes@grangerwa.org](mailto:alfredo.reyes@grangerwa.org)
